Harrisonburg.Kyle's Mill House: Kyle's Mill House is a historic home located near Harrisonburg, Rockingham County, Virginia. It was built about 1750, and was built as a two-story, hall-parlor plan log dwelling with a side gable roof. It was expanded about 1826 to a central-hall plan, a rear ell was added in 1903, and the house was renovated in 1986.
